short_summary: RMSO Meat, Fish, and Poultry 3rd period
description: Meat and poultry products (Minimally processed meat and poultry products, Processed meat and poultry products)
tags: Department of Public Works and Government Services
full_summary:
**Government Tender Announcement**
=====================================

**Title**: EC095-230005 RMSO Meat, Fish, and Poultry 3rd Period

**Tender Reference Number**: WS3930664986-Doc3941856309

**Publication Date**: June 30, 2023

**Tender Closing Date and Time**: August 22, 2023, at 2:00 PM (Eastern Daylight Time)

**Contract Period**: May 1, 2023, to October 31, 2023 (Expected)

**Description**: The Department of Public Works and Government Services is inviting contractors to submit a Request for Standing Offer (RSO) for the supply of meat, fish, and poultry products for the 3rd period.

**Scope of Work**: The scope of work includes the supply of meat and poultry products, including minimally processed and processed products. The following UNSPSC codes are applicable to this tender:

* 50110000: Meat and poultry products
* 50111500: Minimally processed meat and poultry products
* 50112000: Processed meat and poultry products

**Trade Agreements**: This tender is subject to the Trade Agreements, including the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**Delivery Regions**: The delivery regions for this tender include:

* Newfoundland and Labrador
* Canada (National)
* Nova Scotia
* New Brunswick

**Procurement Method**: This tender will be conducted through a competitive and open bidding process.

**Evaluation Criteria**: The evaluation criteria for this tender include price, which will be the primary factor in selecting the contractor.

**Contact Information**: For further information, please contact Andrew MacFarlane, Purchaser, at andrew.macfarlane@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca.

**Tender Documents**: The notice and tender documents are available on the Government of Canada's Buy and Sell web site.

**Note**: This tender has expired, and no new offers will be accepted. The Department of Public Works and Government Services reserves the right to award the contract to the highest rated bidder for this contract period. 
